name: Ængelbert the Unpredictable
description:
Ængelbert the Unpredictable is an interactive text-based adventure game where you don't control the hero's choices, only which ITEMS THEY WIELD.

Designed for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 brief 'OUT OF CONTROL', this game sees you play as Ængelbert, the fickle and unreliable young knight, in a world of medieval monasteries, monsters, and manuscripts. Each turn, you will only be able to control which item you use to attempt the task ahead - not what your approach is...

Created with Twine, this branching-paths game explores what would happen is a player could not decide which path was was taken, but was in total control of their inventory.

Writer and Developer: Harley Viveash

(See game for further Credits)
